article: Last summer, my mother and I went to her hometown, Guilin. The city is very  _  in the world  _  it has beautiful rivers and hills. Many  _  from different countries around the world go to  visit  it every year. My motherwasborn  _  a small village near the Li River. When she  _  a little girl, she studied at the village school  _  only five classes and seven  _  . Some children were very  _  and didn't like to study at school,  _  my mother was well-behaved. The teachers were very strict but very friendly.
